name: The Secret of The Purple Cave
name_original: The Secret of The Purple Cave
description:
A metroid-style platformer minigame. Will you be able to overcome its three levels?:

* First level: collect all the items on the stage to open the access to the Purple Cave. You have a time limit to reach the entrance!

* Second level: face the dangers of the cave and reach the entrance to the Secret Treasure Room before the time runs out

* Third level: the Secret Treasure is almost yours, you just have to overcome a final "little" setback.

IMPORTANT NOTE: if you run the game from a browser, keep in mind that it is designed to be controlled with a keyboard and mouse, so from mobile platforms it will not work well... if you want to play from mobile, it is better to install the version available on Google Play .
